title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 7-1.3 - Cessation tax
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 7-1.3 - Cessation tax

State Regulations
(Tax Law, section 213(1))

Any taxpayer that ceases to exercise its franchise or to
be subject to the tax imposed by article 9-A must pay the tax, or balance
thereof, at the time the report is required to be filed; see section
6-4.2
of this Subchapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
7-1.3

Adopted

New

York State Register December 27, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 52, eff. 12/27/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
